Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

læw phwk than k ca ru wa phu dı thi kar lngthosʹ xan xapys ca mayang khea læa kar lngthosʹ xan yangyun ca prasb kæ khea

cnkrathang meux kha baycha khxng rea di ma læa bn phun phændin na di phwyphung khun rea klaw wa cng brrthuk wi nı reux cak thuk chnid pen khu «læa khrxbkhraw khxng cea dwy wentæ phu thi phra daras di kahnd kæ khea wi kxn læa phu sraththa tæ mimi phu sraththa rwm kab khea nxkcak canwn leknxy

læa man læn pha phwk khea pi thamklang khlun luk thea phukhea læa nuhˌ di rxng reiyk lukchay khxng khea sung xyu xyang doddeiyw xo luk khxng chan xey cng ma doysar reux kab rea theid læa cea xya xyu rwm kab phu ptiseth sraththa ley

Khea (lukchay) klaw wa chan ca pi xasay phukhea luk hnung man ca khumkhrxng chan cak na ni di khea (nuhˌ) klaw wa mimi phu dı khumkhrxng nı wan ni cak phra baycha khx ngxallxhˌ wentæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng metta læa khlun di sad khea mara hwang khea thang sxng læa khea (lukchay) di xyu nı hmu phu cm na
